(4)Abnormality of GB-K/DV-KCMY wiring -> Check GB-K/DV-KCMY wiring./Replace. (5) Abnormality of the developing unit (K/C/M/Y) -> Insert and remove the developing unit./Replace. (4) PCU PWB trouble -> Replace PCU PWB.
